document_data.name: Ghaerlin
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghaerlin''' was a guard in [[Langolos]] on the [[Dragon Coast]] in the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|674|14}}
document_data.Activities: He had been a [[horse]] tamer before becoming a guard in service to High Duke [[Horostos]] of Langolos.
document_data.History: After winter of the {{yearlinkName|767}}, after the [[Frostfire Banner]] was sent to [[the Dead Place]] near [[Starmantle]], one of their horses washed up on the coast. Ghaerlin, one of the guards, examined it, concluding it had died from a fall, probably in a panic.
